attributes.action: Any parent unpaying maintenance to the resident parent to be penalised
attributes.background: Why should the non-resident parent be able to stop work and stay out of work and allow the resident parent to carry 100% of the financial burden. Why is there no punishment if one parent is failing to pay a suitable amount each month

rejection.details:
It’s not clear what the petition is asking the UK Government or Parliament to do.

Prison can already be a consequence of failing to pay child maintenance, so we're not sure exactly what you would like to change.

You can find out more here:

https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/family/children-and-young-people/child-maintenance/child-maintenance-2012-scheme/child-maintenance-enforcement/child-maintenance-enforcement-sanctions-ordered-by-the-court/

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
